Cooking Directions: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper, melt butter in a pan, add eggs, cook on low heat while stirring until set.
Butter one side of each bread slice, place cheese between slices with buttered sides facing out, grill on medium heat until golden brown and cheese is melted.

Ingredients: Spaghetti, Olive Oil, Garlic, Red Pepper Flakes, Parsley, Parmesan Cheese, Salt
Cooking Directions: Cook spaghetti until al dente, heat olive oil, saut√© garlic and red pepper flakes, toss in drained pasta, garnish with parsley and Parmesan cheese.

Ingredients: Avocados, Lime, Salt, Cilantro, Onion, Tomato
Cooking Directions: Mash avocados, mix with lime juice, salt, chopped cilantro, onion, and tomato. Serve immediately.
Blend banana, milk, honey, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.
